Description: Samba Financial Group (known as: Samba) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since January 1993. Samba operates within the Banks sector focusing on Diversified Banks. It has companies operating across Saudi Arabia, Pakistan and Cayman Islands. Samba is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in February 1980.
